document.full_text: the oneasia tour tees off for its third season in indonesia this week amid continued criticism from the asian tour as the battle to be the continent's golfing power shows no sign of abating.
document.title: asia tours turf war set for new chapter
lines_and_colors: the oneasia tour tees off for its third season in indonesia this week amid continued criticism from the asian tour as the battle to be the continent's golfing power shows no sign of abating.
